00022 #ifdef _DEBUG
00023         #define Assert(condition) if(!(condition)) throw AssertException(__FILE__, __LINE__, "AssertException: " #condition)
00024     #else
00025         inline void DoNothing(bool){}
00026         #define Assert(condition) DoNothing(!(condition))
